short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ideal for nature lovers seeking relaxation and inspiration on their screen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in the tranquil beauty of a lavender field at sunset with this breathtaking background. The vibrant purple hues of the lavender contrast with the warm, golden glow of the setting sun, creating a serene and peaceful scene. A solitary tree stands gracefully against the horizon, adding a touch of solitude and calmness.
